author: cnbc.com
title: OneDigital Health and Benefits Acquires The Survey Group
text:
Acquisition of Premier Survey Group Broadens Scope of Benefit Offerings
DEDHAM, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- OneDigital Health and Benefits announces today the acquisition of The Survey Group (TSG), an industry leader in compensation surveys and consulting. Through this acquisition, TSG will join forces with Insight Performance, whom OneDigital acquired in November 2017, to create one of the largest compensation and human resources consulting practices in New England.
The Survey Group will add the breadth and depth of TSG’s survey data and expertise to add further value for our employee benefits brokerage and human resources consulting clients. This alliance will also enable TSG to leverage OneDigital’s technology, superb resources and benefits expertise to add further value to their membership.
Mike Ward, Managing Principal, remarked, “We are confident that the addition of TSG will make us stronger and able to deliver even higher quality surveys and service to TSG members, as well as more comprehensive service to all clients.” TSG will continue to operate as usual, only now with the backing, resources and technology of OneDigital and Insight Performance.
About OneDigital Health and Benefits
OneDigital , the nation’s largest company focused exclusively on employee benefits, combines people and technology to deliver the new generation of health and benefits. By contributing fresh-thinking ahead of the market, innovative approaches and market-leading solutions OneDigital provides clients with peace of mind. Serving companies of all sizes, OneDigital offers employers a sophisticated combination of strategic advisory services, analytics, compliance support, human resource capital management tools and comprehensive insurance offerings. Headquartered in Atlanta, OneDigital has more than 1,000 employees throughout the country, serves 37,000 companies and manages nearly $4.5 billion in premiums. Formerly known as Digital Insurance and Digital Benefit Advisors, the company has been named to the Inc. 5000 List of America’s fastest-growing companies every year since the honor’s inception in 2007.
About The Survey Group
The Survey Group is a source for compensation and benefits data, human resources information, and consulting services. The group’s mission is to provide reliable and high-quality compensation, benefits and human resources information to members and clients. For over five decades they have provided human resources consulting services to over 1,000 member and non-member organizations across the nation.
